title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python applications.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript library for Ollama, allowing browser and Node.js apps to call local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, exposing chat, embeddings, and tool-calling wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI), offering ChatGPT-like interface for local models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama, providing typed client methods and async support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Bash wrapper script adding interactive menus and batch operations on top of the official CLI.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style plugin that uses Ollama models for local code completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage options.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama installation and service module.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# client for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service inside CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go library for Ollama, exposing generated structs for chat, embeddings, and tool calls.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerized with GPU support.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that routes user prompts to a local Ollama instance with per-user quotas and moderation.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds AI assistant block powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin enabling LLM-assisted writing and summarization via Ollama.
